Wolcott Avenue, Chicago, IL 60612,  (312) 413-5200  Hours of Operations: Monday – Friday: 6:30am – 10pm, Saturday-Sunday: Closed  Student Services Building , 1200 W. Harrison Street, Chicago, IL  (312) 413-5000  Hours of Operation:  Monday – Friday – 7:00am – 8:00pm, Saturday & Sunday – Closed (Open Saturday 7am-3pm as needed)        Student Center East Directory    Student Center West Directory    Student Service Building Directory             Campus Parking  Please visit the uic parking website for pricing and parking services at https://parking.uic.edu/  Parking Lot for SCE – Halsted/Taylor Parking Structure (HLPS) – 760 W. Taylor Street, Chicago, IL 60607  Parking Lot for SCW – Wood Street Parking Structure (WSPS) – 1100 S. Wood Street, Chicago, IL 60612  Parking Lot for SSB – Lot 1B, 1139 W. Harrison Street, Chicago, IL 60607   UIC Parking Website             Spring Break 2020 Building Hours  Spring Break has been extended for 2 weeks  Starting Monday, March 16, 2020, the Student Centers Building Hours will be 6:30am – 10:30pm DAILY for Student Center East (SCE) and will be  6:30am – 9:00pm and CLOSED on weekends for Student Center West (SCW)  Spring Break Hours will remain in effect until Sunday, March 29, 2020.
